# name

The name of the target animation that is set using the -webkit-animation-name property.

## Declaration

```swift
attribute DOMString name
```

## Accessing Properties

- **cssRules**: The set of style rules that define the keyframes following the animation name.

## Related Documentation

- **Safari CSS Visual Effects Guide**
